Who: CYCLONUS, DEEPSTRYKE, PHOBIA, NIGHTRAZOR, Nightlight
Location: Black Fortress - Throne Room

> "Of course" she said "I'll be glad to help"

Cyclonus nodded as he came over to stand next to Nightlight, folding
his arms behind his back, his stature straightening into a noble
almost regal bearing, his optics glinting with repressed emotion.

At the fore of the room the door opened and several soldiers entered
the room, three of them.

The first one, although a few inches shorter than Cyclonus himself, he
was still a little taller than Nightlight. Of the three he was the
most physically massive, and seemingly riddled with weaponry. Four
cannons sat on his broad shoulders as well as a rather large rifle
that he held easily in his hand. He was armor was thick and well
articulated, hued in gray and red.

The second one was colored almost completely in black, with only deep
purples and blues to break the rhythm. He was obviously a jet of some
type, looking almost like a remodeled seeker of some sort, he had
patches of red on his wings that looked something like radar dishes.
Also his build was also much slimmer, his movements were also more
graceful and smooth, almost catlike as he walked and looked about.

The last one was a female, the only one of the trio. She was
predominantly red and white, although there were traces of black along
her shoulders and hips and legs. From the cockpit that helped form her
chest, she was most likely a jet of some type, although the lack of
obvious wings made the specific type not easy to determine. As she
walked into the room, her movements were crafty, observant, and in
their own unique way seductive.

"Ahh Cyclonus." said the female, "It has been so long since we have
seen you." she said as she smiled at him as she looked him up and
down. She turned to look at Nightlight, "And who is this?" she said as
she crossed her arms over her chest.

Cyclonus only smiled coldly as he turned slightly to Nightlight, "Lady
Nightlight" he said gallantly, "I would like you to meet Deepstryke."
he said pointing the larges of the three, the one with all the
weaponry. "And there is Nightrazor." Cyclonus said as he gestured to
the dark of the three. "And the last here in all her glory is Phobia"

At that point Phobia smiled sweetly as she continued to look
Nightlight up and down.

"And where is this Hydras?" Nightrazer said, his voice hardly a
whisper as he talked.

Cyclonus gestured for them to step further into the throne room, "He
will be here momentarily Cyclonus said, "For the moment make your
selves comfortable."

Even as Cyclonus spoke he keyed a message to Hydras that the allies
had arrived in the throne room.

(TAG)
